string.value: Apparently, the place that makes the best roasted pork in Korean Folk Town is Chil Sung's...

I went to Chil Sung's place because he was apparently the best at making roasted pork in Folk Town. He asked for 5 Moon Bunny's Pounders and 1,000 mesos in return for roasted pork.\n\n#t4000169# #b#c4000169##k/5
I gave Chil Sung 5 #t4000169#s and 1,000 mesos for 1 roasted pork.
Hello, it's been a while. How can I help you? \r\n#L0# #bCan I get some roasted pork?#k

Roasted pork? Well, I can Say with great confidence that I'm the best at making those. Since you have helped us last time, I'll promise to make you a plate full if you can help me out a little bit here.

I've been stacking up the crops and pounding them on the mortar, but the Pounder broke. If you can get me #b5 Pounders#k from the Moon Bunnies, then I'll make the roasted pork for you for only #b1000 mesos#k.
Didn't you come because you needed some roasted pork?
Oh my gosh, you really found it! Well, now that you brought the Pounder, here's the roasted pork.
If you ever find yourself in need of roasted pork, then please come talk to me. It'll take me around 2 hours to make a plate full of it.
I'll give you roasted pork after you get me 5 Pounder.
